name: ANTI (Pushpendra)
description:
Two foxes are joined together. Control both of them with the same buttons and reach the end without wasting heath.
HAVE FUN !!

Credits: Developed by Pushpendra Singh

- Environment, sprites and music asset by ANSIMUZ (https://ansimuz.itch.io/ )

PS: This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours. So in one level only, I have try to include many small fun things like reversing gravity, teleportation, etc. It might be annoying but it will be fun overall ;-). Also, reversed gravity has a few glitches:(.
